statement.p: In 1992, the moose population in a park was measured to be 4070. By 1998, the population was measured again to be 4730. If the population continues to change linearly:
Find a formula for the moose population, \displaystyle{P}, in terms of \displaystyle{t}, the years since 1990.
What does your model predict the moose population to be in 2003?
